infoData.title: Product Desinger & Developer
infoData.author: Stephen A. Warren, J.R
infoData.introduction: HIGHLY SKILLED DEVELOPER, WITH TALENTS IN CREATING CONTENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEMS & WEB BASED APPLICATIONS -- SPENDING MORE THAN 10 YEARS ASSISTING CLIENTS IN A VARIETY OF MULTIMEDIA PROJECTS WITH THE PURPOSE OF INCREASING USER INTERACTIONS AND OVERALL SALES.

jobOne.title: AVX Studio
jobOne.descriptionOne: ~ FORMED BRAND STRATEGIES AND ASSISTED IN THE CREATION OF BRAND IDENTITY & AWARENESS. ~ ILLUSTRATED AMAZING ASSETS TO BE UTILIZED WITHIN THE UI. ~ PROVIDED VISUAL EXPERIENCES USING METHODS SUCH AS USER RESEARCH, WEB DEVELOPMENT, AND ANIMATIONS.
jobOne.descriptionTwo: ~ MAINTAINED WEEKLY TASK THAT INCLUDED WEB MANAGEMENT, MARKETING, SEO, GRAPHIC DESIGN, VIDEO EDITING, AND ILLUSTRATIONS. ~ OVERSAW ALL GRAPHIC & PRINT DESIGN ~ INCREASED BRAND RECOGNITION AND SALES THROUGH SOCIAL MEDIA MARKETING. RESEARCHED, PLANNED AND DESIGNED A FULLY FUNCTIONAL WEB APPLICATION. ~ DEVELOPED A SERVERLESS CMS FOR CONTENT MANAGEMENT ON BOTH WEB AND MOBILE APPLICATIONS.
jobOne.descriptionThree: ~ CREATED MONTHLY DATA REPORTS. ~ ESTABLISHED A BETTER USER EXPERIENCE BY COLLECTING ANALYTIC DATA FROM AD IMPRESSIONS, REACH, AND SESSIONS. ~ VERBALIZED AND REPORTED ALL TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS TO STAKEHOLDERS, OWNERS, AND/OR MANAGEMENT.

jobTwo.title: Jen & Co
jobTwo.description: ~ DESIGNED ASSETS FOR WEB USE. ~ DEVELOPED APPLICATIONS AND MAINTAINED SCRIPT FILES USING BIGCOMMERCE//HANDLEBAR.JS. ~ IMPLEMENTED GOOGLE ANALYTICS TO FURTHER STUDY WEB TRAFFIC AND SOLUTIONS. ~ DESIGNED AND CREATED WEEKLY NEWSLETTERS USING SERVICES SUCH AS MAILCHIMP ~ ASSISTED IN THE CREATION & DESIGN OF THE BI-ANNUAL STORE CATALOG.
